mapper.sql: submit_id, plan_id, plan_name, paper_id, paper_name, user_id, real_name, status, start_time, submit_time, mark_time, publish_time, total_score, mark_user_id, mark_user, create_time, update_time,user_answer_count,paper_count
mapper.select:
select
from ( select t.* ,(select t1.plan_name from om_exam_plan t1 where t1.plan_id=t.plan_id) as plan_name ,(select t1.paper_name from om_paper t1 where t1.paper_id=t.paper_id) as paper_name ,(select t1.real_name from om_user t1 where t1.user_id=t.user_id) as real_name ,(select count(1) from om_exam_answer t1 where t1.user_id = t.user_id and t1.plan_id=t.plan_id and t1.paper_id=t.paper_id and t1.answer_result is not null) as user_answer_count ,(select t1.single_count+t1.multi_count+t1.judge_count+t1.blank_count+t1.answer_count from om_paper t1 where t1.paper_id=t.paper_id) as paper_count from om_exam_submit t, om_paper t1 where t.paper_id=t1.paper_id and t1.deleted='0' ) as t where submit_id = #{submitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(*) from ( select t.* ,(select t1.plan_name from om_exam_plan t1 where t1.plan_id=t.plan_id) as plan_name ,(select t1.paper_name from om_paper t1 where t1.paper_id=t.paper_id) as paper_name ,(select t1.real_name from om_user t1 where t1.user_id=t.user_id) as real_name ,(select count(1) from om_exam_answer t1 where t1.user_id = t.user_id and t1.plan_id=t.plan_id and t1.paper_id=t.paper_id and t1.answer_result is not null) as user_answer_count ,(select t1.single_count+t1.multi_count+t1.judge_count+t1.blank_count+t1.answer_count from om_paper t1 where t1.paper_id=t.paper_id) as paper_count from om_exam_submit t, om_paper t1 where t.paper_id=t1.paper_id and t1.deleted='0' ) as t
